thread.section_title: Hotel Belleclaire - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location and exceptional value and cleanliness.
thread.title_full: Perfect location and exceptional value and cleanliness. - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 199tracib
title: Perfect location and exceptional value and cleanliness.
text: Close to the subway which was brilliant. Spotless room, excellent comfort, friendly staff and walking distance to Lincoln Center and Central Park. Great halfway point between uptown and downtown. We plan on making this our hotel of choice whenever we visit NYC.
